name: 2024 6th International Electronics Communication Conference
content: Accepted papers will be published in the ACM International Conference Proceedings (ISBN: 979-8-4007-1759-8), which will be indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus. IECC 2019, 2020, 2021, 2022 & 2023 papers have been indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus.
